description: Three adults have also died as their boat sank off Turkey's coast near the Greek island of Chios.
title: Migrant crisis: Eight children die as boat sinks off Turkey
title_page: Migrant crisis: Eight children die as boat sinks off Turkey - BBC News
maintext: Hours earlier, another migrant boat sank in the Ionian Sea near the south-western Greek island of Paxi, leaving at least 12 dead. Greek officials said 21 people had been rescued and that they were still trying to determine how many people were on the vessel.
